summary: Follows the routines of those employed at Studio Ghibli, including filmmakers Hayao Miyazaki, Isao Takahata, and Toshio Suzuki as they work to release two films simultaneously, The Wind Rises and The Tale of the Princess Kaguya.
cast: Hayao Miyazaki|Yumiko Miyoshi|Toshio Suzuki|Shinsuke Nonaka|Ushiko|Yoshiaki Nishimura|Seiji Okuda|Hideaki Anno|Gorô Miyazaki|Joe Hisaishi|Isao Takahata
title: El reino de los sueños y la locura
